Luhut Panggil Mendag Hari Ini, Bahas Apa?
07 Nov 2019, 08:17 by Anisa Indraini


Foto: Menko Maritim Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan bertemu Menteri Perdagangan AS Wilbur Ross (Anisa Indraini/detikFinance)

Jakarta - Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan hari ini memanggil Menteri Perdagangan Agus Suparmanto ke kantornya.Pantauan detikcom Kamis (7/11/2019), Agus tiba di kantor Luhut sekitar pukul 14.50 WIB. Ia hadir mengenakan batik berwarna merah muda. Agus pun langsung bergegas masuk gedung setibanya di Kantor Luhut.Selain Agus, hadir pula Direktur Jenderal Minerba Kementerian ESDM Bambang Gatot Ariyono. Bambang tiba lebih dulu yaitu sekitar pukul 14.12 WIB.Berdasarkan jadwal Luhut, hari ini Luhut akan menggelar rapat koordinasi (rakor) membahas soal pelarangan ekspor bijih nikel.Berdasarkan catatan detikcom, saat ini pemerintah telah menghentikan sementara ekspor nikel. Pasalnya, belakangan ini pemerintah menemukan pelanggaran dalam ekspor tersebut.Pelanggaran itu salah satunya terkait ekspor yang melebihi kuota, bahkan sampai tiga kali lipat. Biasanya, ekspor nikel hanya 30 kapal per bulan, kini bisa mencapai 100 hingga 130 kapal per bulanSecara resminya, pelarangan tersebut mulai berlaku pada 1 Januari 2020. Adapun, larangan bijih nikel ini tertuang dalam Peraturan Menteri ESDM No 11 Tahun 2019. Simak Video "Mendag Sampaikan Doa dari 16 Negara Untuk Wiranto"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)

Luhut Call the Trade Minister Today, What Discuss?
Nov 7 2019, 08:17 by Anisa Indraini


Photo: Maritime Coordinating Minister Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan meets US Trade Minister Wilbur Ross (Anisa Indraini / detikFinance)

Jakarta - Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan today summoned the Minister of Trade Agus Suparmanto to his office. Monitoring on AFP Thursday (7/11/2019), Agus arrived at Luhut's office around 14.50 WIB. He was present wearing pink batik. Agus immediately rushed into the building upon arrival at the Luhut Office. Besides Agus, there was also the Director General of Mineral and Coal at the ESDM Ministry, Bambang Gatot Ariyono. Bambang arrived first at around 14.12 WIB. Based on Luhut's schedule, today Luhut will hold a coordination meeting (coordination meeting) to discuss the ban on nickel ore exports. Based on the AFP record, the government has temporarily suspended nickel exports. Because, lately the government found violations in exports. One of the violations was related to exports that exceeded the quota, even up to three times. Typically, nickel exports are only 30 vessels per month, now it can reach 100 to 130 ships per month. Officially, the ban came into force on January 1, 2020. Meanwhile, the ban on nickel ore is contained in the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources Regulation No 11 of 2019.
